task.title: Valuable Time
task.shortdesc: The break is just a week but Maggie wants to do a lot while she is at NOVA. She may go to her beach house with her family, she will probably work on some homework, go swimming, eat home-cooked food and play with her dog.

taskbody.context: Maggie wants to make sure that she has enough time to do all these activities so she needs to plan accordingly.

step.cmd: Look over class assignments and enter into agenda
Look over family beach house schedule
Divide time between her family, pets, schoolwork and friends in a fair manner
